title: Low elo, ranked team
body:
I main mid but we can swap it up if wanted! This is just so we can get use to playing with consistent team and each other. No abuse team.
Add: Aidan7787 and message me about teams
Will use a type of chat software which is decided on after next week when i have unlimited internet again. Uni is over so will be playing very often.
Team: Pandemic (Pdmc)
